name: Jumpy Cube
description:
Download jumpy cube for free today and see how far you can get! With every barrier you pass the speed increases making the game harder! Share a picture of your high score! #JumpyCube

Jumpy Cube created by Niion in a few hours as a quick project. It is buggy and pretty stupid but play it if you want! Currently only runs on windows. Released for free. no copyright infringment intended. feel free to re-distribute. credit is nice.
